channel.title: Core-Monthly on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Core-Monthly on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - October 2025
item.description: October has been an exceptional month for the PrestaShop project! We released the first maintenance version of PrestaShop 9, opened registration for our biggest community event of the year, and watched the Admin API contribution initiative gain incredible momentum. Letâ€™s dive into what made this month so special.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - September 2025
item.description: Welcome to the September edition of the Core Monthly! This month was buzzing with activity around PrestaShop 9, with the team working on its first patch release and the community stepping up to expand the new Admin API. We also saw some fantastic new tools and improvements, all thanks to dedicated contributors.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - August 2025
item.description: Welcome to the August edition of Core Monthly. This month brought an important security patch for 8.2, a new community feature in the back office, and a fresh call for contributions to expand the Admin API in PrestaShop 9.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - March 2025
item.description: Whatâ€™s new in the project? Weâ€™re ending the quarter strong! Project members with the help of the community have been working hard to prepare the next major release of PrestaShop. Release of the completely new version of the Auto Upgrade Update Assistant module, and thatâ€™s only a glimpse of the work done in March. Read on to learn more about the latest changes in the PrestaShop project.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - February 2024
item.description: With over 250 pull requests merged in the project repositories, February was a busy month for the PrestaShop open source project. We released the security patch, PrestaShop 8.1.4, and made significant progress on the new API. Letâ€™s take a look at the most important changes in the codebase.

item.description: November was marked by the first PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - October
item.description: In this Core Monthly, check out what weâ€™ve been up to in October with PrestaShopâ€™s core and modules. Also, get a sneak peek at the agenda and speakers for the upcoming PrestaShop Developer Conference.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - September
item.description: In this article, delve into Septemberâ€™s updates and news from the project. As well as Hacktoberfest 2023â€™s kick off, offering a month-long celebration of open-source contributions. Keep reading for more information.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - August
item.description: A little later than usual, discover the latest happenings in the PrestaShop Project for August 2023. We had a productive month, successfully merging more than 240 pull requests and releasing PrestaShop 8.1.1 and some security patches. Read on to find out more!

item.description: The new PrestaShop 8.1, ongoing work on PrestaShop 9.0, new content in the developer documentation and more! Read about all this news in the Core Monthly report for June.
